title: Fire Flame Watch Face
summary: Fire and cute watch face for rebels

descriptionHTML:
Fire and cute watch face for rebels. If you like speed, hot roads or choppers, this is your choice.

FEATURES:

★ 12/24 auto-format
★ High Resolution Design
★ Ambient (dimmed) mode
★ Support for Round and Square watches

INSTRUCTION:

1. Install Watch Face
2. Wait a minute
2. Go to Android Wear Application
3. Choose Flame Watch Face
4. Enjoy!

The fire watchface has been tested on Moto® 360, LG® G Watch R, ASUS® ZenWatch, Sony® SmartWatch and other. Any problems? Please email me and I'll try my best to fix any issues you have!
recentChanges: + Some fixes for Moto 360 (2015) and Huawei Watch
